hobbies.name: Rock climbing
hobbies.description: I love rock climbing.  My feet make it easy to scale large rocks.  Hanging upside down is totally rad.

hobbies.name: Being multicolored
hobbies.description: My colors change based on my mood.  And if I want to camo!

hobbies.name: Awkward eye contact
hobbies.description: It's hilarious when lizards can't get this basic skill down.  It's a important part of culture, ya know?

hobbies.name: Having a rad tail
hobbies.description: I try not to flaunt it, but It's too hard.  My tail is rad and I'm proud of it.  Plz don't pull on it or you'll get tail whipped.

hobbies.name: Striking a pose
hobbies.description: It's a known fact that some lizards are more gifted at striking a pose than other lizards.  Take me, for example.  I don't have to try even - I'm always ready to strike a pose.

hobbies.name: Frilled Neck
hobbies.description: This is dreadlocks for lizards.

hobbies.name: Push ups
hobbies.description: Gotta stay fit.  Gotta stay fit.

hobbies.name: Amazing eye contact
hobbies.description: When I look your way, you'll surely look back, and totally perceive the gravity of what I'm saying.  You know what they say, the eyes are a window into the soul.
